Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value initialization|Value-initializes]] the {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|nullptr}} and [[cpp/language/default initialization|default-initializes]] the {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}}.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Initializes {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{box|{{tt|i.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}}}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|std::move(i.current_)}}.

@3@ A private constructor which is used by {{lc|cartesian_product_view::begin}} and {{lc|cartesian_product_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users.
Initializes {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|std::addressof(parent)}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} with {{c|std::move(current)}}.
